name: Emerald Staff
description: A staff made from rare emerald material, imbued with magical energy.
looks: The Emerald Staff is a staff made from a single large emerald crystal, polished to perfection. It has intricate engravings along its length and emits a faint green glow.

special_weapon_skils.magic_damage: Increases damage dealt by magical spells.

special_effects.magic_amplification: Increases the power of all magical spells cast with this staff.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword that is commonly used by adventurers and warriors.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade that shines with a dull gray color. The hilt is wrapped in worn leather for a better grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Wooden Staff
description: A simple wooden staff used for casting spells and channeling magical energy.
looks: The wooden staff is made from a solid piece of oak wood. It is about six feet long with a smooth and polished surface. The top of the staff is carved into intricate designs that resemble leaves and branches.

special_weapon_skills.magic_missile: Allows the wielder to cast the Magic Missile spell.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword has a slender blade with a polished silver finish. The handle is wrapped in black leather with intricate silver engravings. It emanates a faint glow.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.holy_damage: Deals additional holy damage with each strike.

name: Vorpal Blade
description: A legendary sword with a razor-sharp edge that can sever limbs in a single strike.
looks: The Vorpal Blade is a longsword with a gleaming silver blade that seems to hum with power. The hilt is made of polished ebony, carved with intricate patterns of dragons and serpents.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.sever: Has a chance to sever limbs on critical hits.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A small iron dagger, perfect for quick and stealthy strikes.
looks: The iron dagger has a short, curved blade with a sharp point. The handle is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

name: Leather Gloves
description: A pair of light and flexible gloves made from high-quality leather.
looks: The leather gloves are designed to fit snugly on the hands, providing protection and dexterity. They have reinforced stitching and adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Steel Sword
description: A well-crafted steel sword that is both sharp and durable.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a single-edged design. The handle is made of leather and has a simple crossguard. The overall design of the sword is sleek and functional.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill while equipped.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword, capable of delivering powerful strikes.
looks: The iron sword has a long, straight blade with a single edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip, and the pommel is made of iron.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic one-handed sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is simple, made of a wooden grip wrapped in leather, and a crossguard made of iron.

special_effects.bleed: Has a chance to inflict bleeding on the target.

name: Fire Sword
description: A sword infused with the element of fire, capable of dealing fiery damage to enemies.
looks: The Fire Sword has a gleaming blade made of enchanted steel that flickers with flames. The handle is wrapped in leather, with a fiery symbol etched into the pommel.

special_weapon_skills.fire_mastery: Increases damage dealt with fire-based weapons.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword suitable for close combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge and a sharp point. The hilt is made of leather-wrapped metal with a simple crossguard.

name: Golden Gauntlets
description: A pair of gauntlets made from solid gold, providing both protection and a touch of luxury.
looks: The Golden Gauntlets are crafted from pure gold, with intricate engravings along the surface. They have a polished finish that gleams in the light.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword has a shiny blade and a hilt wrapped in black leather. The pommel is adorned with a small blue gemstone.

special_effects.silver_enchantment: Deals extra damage to certain creatures vulnerable to silver.
